<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deimatic Display](/Feats.aspx?ID=1715) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

Imitating animal threat displays, you make yourself appear larger and more imposing. Roll one [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) and compare the result to the Will DC of each [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9), [fungus](/Traits.aspx?ID=77), and [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125) creature in a 15-foot cone. When you do, Demoralize gains the [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) trait, and creatures are affected if they can see you. You don't take a penalty if the creature doesn't understand your language.
name: Deimatic Display
